resources.string:
Scrabble Tutor is an Android application to help learn words for Scrabble.
 
 Game types are:

Random blank: this displays words with a random letter missing. Enter the letters that make valid words, with each letter separated by a blank or a comma.

N to make N+1: this displays a valid word of length N, which can be expanded with letters at the beginning or end, to make other valid words of length N+1. Either enter the full words that match the pattern, with each word separated by a blank or a comma, or enter partial words of the form "a-" and "-s", where "-" will be replaced with the root ("N") word.

Q without U: this displays words which have a Q without a following U. Enter the letters that make valid words, with each letter separated by a blank or a comma.

With hints: this displays words with a random letter missing. Enter the letters that make valid words, with each letter separated by a blank or a comma. A hint is displayed with the results, where the letters in the hint are valid for the missing letter.


 This version of Scrabble Tutor uses the Scrabble Tournament Word List (TWL), the dictionary used in Canada, Thailand, and the United States.
